name: Cube Racer
description: Cube Racer is a round based multiplayer racing game with cubes. Every round, all players race against each other to the finish line. Before every round, the players get to build one or more obstacles on the map. In the next round, all players have to pass all the obstacles, which have been built yet.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
